channel.title: ★Runescape 3/EOC & 07Scape/OSRS ◄Botting List & Informantion about bots! [★]
channel.description: [CENTER] [b]If you have any information regarding bots in general please tell me so I can add it to the thread :)[/b] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fb8b59463cc82bf76a7fb13b7fbfb9b0.png[/img] Don't use bad scripts; they get you banned, its not always the bot. If you're choosing between reflection and injection, reflection is a better choice as injection is more quickly detected. Try not to all-out bot one skill; try to take it even and bot other skills so the ban rate will be lowered. Try to keep combined daily botting and legit play-time hours under 8 hours per day. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d0d8566a3e69510b8d2666a5b2fa09d9.png[/img] Epicbot l [url=http://www.epicbot.com/]http://www.epicbot.com/[/url] l Tribot l [url=http://tribot.org/]http://tribot.org/[/url] l Robotz in Disguise l [url=http://robotzindisguise.com/]http://robotzindisguise.com/[/url] l Simba l [url=http://villavu.com/]http://villavu.com/[/url] Powerbot | [url=http://powerbot.org/]http://powerbot.org/[/url] l RuneMate | [url=https://www.runemate.com/]https://www.runemate.com/[/url] l [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a75da968d354c3990591d270cdb5c652.png[/img] Epicbot l [url=http://www.epicbot.com/]http://www.epicbot.com/[/url] l Robotz in Disguise l [url=http://robotzindisguise.com/]http://robotzindisguise.com/[/url] l Osbot l [url=http://osbot.org/]http://osbot.org/[/url] l Tribot l [url=http://tribot.org/]http://tribot.org/[/url] l TopBot l [url=http://topbot.org/]http://topbot.org/[/url] l Excobot l [url=http://excobot.org/]http://excobot.org/[/url] l Simba l [url=http://villavu.com/]http://villavu.com/[/url] l Powerbot | [url=http://powerbot.org/]http://powerbot.org/[/url] l RuneMate | [url=https://www.runemate.com/]https://www.runemate.com/[/url] l [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5a4cf17762921c520138f8bd4f4d921a.png[/img] For 07/Osrs Botting use Tribot/Topbot or Powerbot. For RS3/EOC Botting use Powerbot/RID or Tribot. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/6db316d367c85988274fc5343aea4574.png[/img] Powerbot(RsBot) is the most popular runescape bot and it has been out since 2006 but they have detectable problems in their bot since jagex are always on their case. TopBot is the only bot where you can choose Injection or Reflection. [/CENTER]

item.title: ★Runescape 3/EOC & 07Scape/OSRS ◄Botting List & Informantion about bots! [★]
item.dc:creator: @Astrola Astrola
item.description:
@Astrola wrote:

[CENTER]
If you have any information regarding bots in general please tell me so I can add it to the thread

Don’t use bad scripts; they get you banned, its not always the bot.
If you’re choosing between reflection and injection, reflection is a better choice as injection is more quickly detected.
Try not to all-out bot one skill; try to take it even and bot other skills so the ban rate will be lowered.
Try to keep combined daily botting and legit play-time hours under 8 hours per day.

Epicbot l http://www.epicbot.com/ l
Tribot l http://tribot.org/ l
Robotz in Disguise l http://robotzindisguise.com/ l
Simba l http://villavu.com/
Powerbot | http://powerbot.org/ l
RuneMate | https://www.runemate.com/ l

Epicbot l http://www.epicbot.com/ l
Robotz in Disguise l http://robotzindisguise.com/ l
Osbot l http://osbot.org/ l
Tribot l http://tribot.org/ l
TopBot l http://topbot.org/ l
Excobot l http://excobot.org/ l
Simba l http://villavu.com/ l
Powerbot | http://powerbot.org/ l
RuneMate | https://www.runemate.com/ l

For 07/Osrs Botting use Tribot/Topbot or Powerbot.
For RS3/EOC Botting use Powerbot/RID or Tribot.

Powerbot(RsBot) is the most popular runescape bot and it has been out since 2006 but they have detectable problems in their bot since jagex are always on their case.
TopBot is the only bot where you can choose Injection or Reflection.
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
